Medium: 5 gelatin silver prints and 2 gelatin silver prints cut-and-pasted together
Dimensions: Sheets of various dimensions: from 1 1/2 x 4 3/4" (3.8 x 12.1 cm) (irreg.) to 7 1/2 x 5 9/16" (19 x 14.2 cm)
Artist: V. Gruental, Nikolai Lavrent'ev, Varvara Alexandrovna Rodchenko, Varvara Stepanova
CreditLine: Gift of The Judith Rothschild Foundation (Donation of Varvara Rodchenko)
Title: Illustrations for Great Plan, an album about forest planting in deserts and fields (never published)
